body: When Isaiah Johnson started vocational training at the Schermerhorn Street office of the Brooklyn Bureau of Community Service in 1988, he was looking for a job, not for love. Then he met Margaret Williams during lunch at the bureau. Two years later, they were married and moved into an apartment in Bedford-Stuyvesant. The two seemed ideally matched.
